Did you try to clean your configuration area?

>Did you try to clean your configuration area?
I hope that is not a prerequisite to get things working with the new changes..

It goes against Jeff's claim that we could slip any new runtime without people 
noticing ;-)

Yes.
The attached log is from today, but yesterday evening I tried cleaning 
configuration and workspace and it did not help.

I am not able to reproduce.  Are you running from a read-only configuration?

Please run with tracing enabled for org.eclipse.osgi with the "debug" box 
checked (this should be the first checkbox under the org.eclipse.osgi tracing 
options).  Please attach the console output to this bug.  Thanks.

Alternately, you could save the console log directly to a file and attach it 
to the bug report.  Take a look at the Common tab of the launch config for 
that option.

Created an attachment (id=17220)
This one with "debug" selected.

Let me guess... you have specified the -clean option.  If I run with -clean I 
can reproduce.  I have checked in a fix to HEAD.
